attributes.action: Abolish tax discs and collect car tax at MOT time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We aren't required to display our television license in our house window, why do we have to display the vehicle license in our car window? Requiring a visible tax disc is now simply an unnecessary inconvenience for drivers. The DVLA now hold all the details on computer, so they know which cars are and aren't taxed. It would be very simple to allow the tax to be paid at the same time as an MOT certificate is issued.
